name: hyprtile
description: Tile GNOME windows the Hyprland way.

scripts.build: git clean -qxf ':/dist' ':/out' hyprtile.dist.tgz && tsc -p tsconfig.prod.json && rm -rf dist/types && tar -czf hyprtile.tgz -C dist .
scripts.serve:remote: scp hyprtile.tgz laptop:~/Downloads/hyprtile.tgz && ssh laptop 'gnome-extensions install -f ~/Downloads/hyprtile.tgz'

author: topazrn
